name: parkbenchsolutions/odinapi-onelogin
description: Park Bench version of Workivate version of OneLogin PHP SAML Toolkit

suggest.ext-openssl: Install openssl lib in order to handle with x509 certs (require to support sign and encryption)
suggest.ext-curl: Install curl lib to be able to use the IdPMetadataParser for parsing remote XMLs
suggest.ext-gettext: Install gettext and php5-gettext libs to handle translations
